name: PYXEL Tower Defense
description:
PYXEL TOWER DEFENSE is a tower defense game that takes you back to old flash games in the same genre. Defend the world from different enemies as they try to make their way to the exit with the help of different towers with different stats and abilities.

Controls

Only the mouse!

75 Waves

There are 75 waves with 13 different types of enemies and 9 different levels to complete!

The Development

This is the first game I have made in Construct 3 after previously only using Scratch.
